newsitem.title: THAILAND: PTT Exploration says to borrow $200 mln.
newsitem.headline: PTT Exploration says to borrow $200 mln.

text.p: Thailand's PTT Exploration and Production Plc said on Friday it plans to borrow loans totalling about $200 million next year to finance development of its Pailin oilfield project in the Gulf of Thailand.
PTT Exploration has a 45 percent interest in the Pailin project with Unocal's Thai unit and several other foreign firms.
It said natural gas from the Pailin project will be sold to the state-owned Petroleum Authority of Thailand (PTT) under a long term contract. PTT Exploration is majority owned by the PTT.
The PTT will buy 165 million cubic feet of natural gas per day from the Pailin source, PTT Exploration said.
